abstract: Turkey blocks website Tavka Haber, which has published extremist content meant to lure Turks to Islamic State and evaded country's internet regulations for years.
lead_paragraph: The court said that the website, Takva Haber, and its affiliate video site, Takva Tube, were spreading “terror propaganda.”

headline.main: Court Blocks Jihadist Website Used to Recruit Turks to Islamic State
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Turkey: Court Blocks a Jihadist Website

snippet: The court said that the website, Takva Haber, and its affiliate video site, Takva Tube, were spreading “terror propaganda.”

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
